instructions:
Add water, lemon juice, and Creole seasoning to a saucepan over high heat. Bring to rapid boil, then add the shrimp, and cover. Cook approximately 1 minute, stir, and cook another 1 to 2 minutes until shrimp are cooked through. Pour the shrimp into a strainer to cool slightly.
Mix all remaining ingredients in a small bowl.
Peel and devein the shrimp when cool enough to handle. In a bowl, toss shrimp with butter mixture. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 pinch Salt and pepper to taste
title: Steamed Creole Shrimp
